news.title: TikTok’s New Q&A Feature Lets Creators Respond to Fan Questions Using Text or Video
news.description: Select creators on TikTok have been granted access to a new Q&A feature that allows creators to more easily engage with fans through video and during live streams.

news.title: Pinterest Tests New Stories Panel at the Top of User Feeds
news.description: Pinterest has rolled out a new “Story Pins” feature, creating a new means of social engagement that highlights the stories of Pinners whom you follow.

news.title: TikTok Provides New Video Overview of How to Set Up a TikTok Ad Campaign
news.description: TikTok has created resources about TikTok Ad Campaigns that will aid business users looking to use the app as part of their strategic outreach and promotion efforts.

news.title: Facebook Rival MeWe Gains 2.5M Members in a Week as Users Seek Privacy
news.description: The ad-free social network MeWe continues to report rapid growth, as social media users search for a way to safeguard their online data from third parties.
